◆ Story ◆

The setting is a training camp in a mountain village. In this place rich in nature, an unprecedented tragedy unfolds...

Early in the morning of the second day of the training camp. A gang of robbers and murderers occupy the training camp of a basketball team on a training tour.

The gang cleverly conspires with the caretaker, fools the police who come to check on them, and stays there while their teammates are gradually taken over by the gang's thugs.

The teammates, who pride themselves on their physical strength, are unable to resist the strength of the men who are used to beating them up and are left to their own devices.

The girls' fate is to be left to their own devices as they are subjected to an unbearable rape that may not end anytime soon...
